mapper.sql: a.id, a.create_time, a.code, a.block_id, a.product_category_id, a.farm_time, a.origin, a.quantity, a.unit, a.unit_price, a.amount, a.status, b.name as block_name, p.name as product_category_name
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from farm_batch a left join info_block b on b.id = a.block_id left join info_product_category p on p.id = a.product_category_id
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from farm_batch a left join info_block b on b.id = a.block_id left join info_product_category p on p.id = a.product_category_id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into farm_batch (create_time, code, block_id, product_category_id, farm_time, origin, quantity, unit, unit_price, amount, status) values (#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blockId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productCategoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{farmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantity,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})
